mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT transfer_id as process_id, transfer_to_store as store_id, transfer_from_store, transfer_to_store, '0' as transfer_origin FROM wms_bt_transfer WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND
transfer_status = '1' AND
sim_flg = '0' AND
transfer_type = '2'
UNION
SELECT id as process_id, store_id, store_id as transfer_from_store, store_id as transfer_to_store, '1' as transfer_origin FROM tt_reservation WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND
status in ('12','13','14','15','16','17','97') AND
close_day_flg = '0'
UNION
SELECT return_session_id as process_id, store_id, store_id as transfer_from_store, store_id as transfer_to_store, '2' as transfer_origin FROM wms_bt_return_session bt_session WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND
return_session_status = '1' AND
return_type = '0' AND
syn_flg = '0' AND
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_return bt_return WHERE bt_session.order_channel_id = bt_return.order_channel_id AND bt_session.return_session_id = bt_return.return_session_id AND bt_return.condition = '01')
UNION
SELECT return_session_id as process_id, store_id, store_id as transfer_from_store, store_id as transfer_to_store, '5' as transfer_origin FROM wms_bt_return_session bt_session WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND
return_session_status = '1' AND
return_type = '1' AND
syn_flg = '0'
UNION
SELECT take_stock_id as process_id, store_id, store_id as transfer_from_store, store_id as transfer_to_store, '3' as transfer_origin FROM wms_bt_take_stock stock WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND
take_stock_status = '3' AND
syn_flg = '0' AND
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_take_stock_compare_result compare_result WHERE stock.take_stock_id = compare_result.take_stock_id AND compare_result.is_fixed = '1' AND compare_result.qty_offsets > 0)
UNION
SELECT take_stock_id as process_id, store_id, store_id as transfer_from_store, store_id as transfer_to_store, '4' as transfer_origin FROM wms_bt_take_stock stock WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND
take_stock_status = '3' AND
syn_flg = '0' AND
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_take_stock_compare_result compare_result WHERE stock.take_stock_id = compare_result.take_stock_id AND compare_result.is_fixed = '1' AND compare_result.qty_offsets < 0)
UNION
SELECT max(seq) as process_id, store_id, store_id as transfer_from_store, store_id as transfer_to_store, '6' as transfer_origin FROM wms_bt_client_inventory WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_client_inventory WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND syn_flg = '0') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_client_inventory WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND syn_flg = '1') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_client_inventory WHERE order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND sim_flg = '0') ) transfer_sim WHERE process_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT transfer.*, (select max(transfer_item_id) from wms_bt_transfer_item item where transfer.transfer_id = item.transfer_id) as transfer_item_id FROM wms_bt_transfer transfer WHERE transfer.order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND transfer.transfer_status = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wms_bt_transfer_item item WHERE transfer.transfer_id = item.transfer_id AND item.syn_flg = '0') ORDER BY transfer_id
mapper.update: UPDATE wms_bt_transfer_item SET syn_flg = '1', modified = now(), modifier = #{task_name} WHERE transfer_id = #{transfer_id} AND transfer_item_id <= #{transfer_item_id} AND syn_flg = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wms_bt_transfer_item_history ( transfer_id, transfer_package_id, transfer_barcode, transfer_sku, transfer_qty, order_number, reservation_id, calc_qty, syn_flg, active, created, creater, modified, modifier ) ( select transfer_id, transfer_package_id, transfer_barcode, transfer_sku, transfer_qty, order_number, reservation_id, calc_qty, syn_flg, active, created, creater, modified, modifier from wms_bt_transfer_item where transfer_id = #{transfer_id} and transfer_item_id <= #{transfer_item_id} and syn_flg = '1' );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wms_bt_transfer_item WHERE transfer_id = #{transfer_id} AND transfer_item_id <= #{transfer_item_id} AND syn_flg = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT tm.brand, tm.cartonNumber, tm.customerPoNumber, tm.custPoLineNo, tm.upc, tm.customerItem, tm.quantityReceived, tm.receiptDate, tm.poNumber, tm.shipmentId, tm.transferId FROM ( SELECT client_shipment.brand AS brand, client_package.ucc128_carton_no AS cartonNumber, package_item.sto_no AS customerPoNumber, package_item.sto_line_no AS custPoLineNo, package_item.upc AS upc, transfer_item.transfer_sku AS customerItem, sum(transfer_item.transfer_qty) AS quantityReceived, transfer_item.created AS receiptDate, transfer.transfer_id AS poNumber, client_shipment.shipment_id AS shipmentId, transfer.transfer_id AS transferId FROM wms_bt_client_shipment client_shipment INNER JOIN wms_bt_client_package client_package ON client_shipment.shipment_id = client_package.shipment_id INNER JOIN wms_bt_client_package_item package_item ON client_package.shipment_id = package_item.shipment_id AND client_package.package_id = package_item.package_id INNER JOIN wms_bt_transfer_item transfer_item ON transfer_item.transfer_barcode = package_item.upc INNER JOIN wms_bt_transfer transfer ON transfer.transfer_id = transfer_item.transfer_id WHERE client_shipment.syn_flg = '0' AND client_shipment.transfer_id = 0 AND client_shipment.active = '1' AND client_shipment.order_channel_id = #{OrderChannelID} AND client_shipment.transfer_id = 0 AND transfer.order_channel_id = #{OrderChannelID} AND transfer.transfer_type = '3' AND transfer.transfer_id > 0 AND transfer.transfer_status = '1' GROUP BY brand, upc, customerPoNumber ) tm GROUP BY tm.upc
